participant_1.background:
I remember when nobody had a television.
I am 100 years old.
I feel like i might live forever.
I love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.

participant_2.background:
I only eat kosher.
I read twenty books a year.
I was raised in a single parent household.
I never broke a bone in my body ever in my life.
I am a stunt double as my second job.

content.text: Wow, you're 100 years old? That's amazing!
Thanks! It's been quite a ride.
I bet! What's your favorite thing about being 100 years old?

I have a lot of favorite things about being 100 years old, but one of my favorites is that I've seen a lot of changes in the world. I've seen the rise and fall of empires, the invention of new technologies, and the birth of new cultures. It's been an amazing journey.
That's incredible! I can't even imagine seeing all of that.
It's been a lot, but it's also been a lot of fun. I've met a lot of wonderful people and had a lot of great experiences.
That's great to hear. I'm glad you've had a good life.
Thanks! I am too.
So, what do you do for fun now that you're 100 years old?
I still read a lot, I love to dance, and I enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
That sounds like a great way to spend your time.
It is! I'm very lucky to have such a wonderful life.
I'm glad to hear that.
Thanks!
So, what do you think is the secret to a long and happy life?
I think there are a lot of things that contribute to a long and happy life, but I think one of the most important things is to have a positive attitude and to be grateful for what you have.
I agree! I think it's also important to stay active and to have a healthy diet.
That's a good point. I think it's also important to surround yourself with positive people and to do things that you enjoy.
I agree! I think all of those things are important for a long and happy life.
I'm glad we agree!
Me too!
